episode_event_specialcos01_ch0004_40_tok:
A few days before the day of the Battle of the
Golden Spheres...
Wait—I have to battle in this?
Mine is hard to walk in...

Well, we are trying to put on showy battles to
promote Pasio, right?

More importantly, we’ve gotta make this fun for
everyone watching the livestream!

Hmm... I wonder how I can make it fun for
everyone watching.

Battling in costumes is a little uncomfortable at
first, but you get used to it over time!
So you’ve done something like this before, Rosa?

Yup! Back in Unova, I got cast in some movies at
Pokéstar Studios!
Pokéstar Studios? That does sound familiar...
What kind of place is that?

Well...it’s this studio where they make movies,
and I got scouted to act in some films they
were making!
Wow! You acted in movies?
You’re practically a superstar!
N-not at all! I’m nowhere near star status!

But if you have experience in show biz, maybe
you can give us some pointers on how to show
off our battles on camera!
Wh-why so serious all of a sudden?

Well, this is something I’ve been thinking after
seeing Diantha’s battles and Lisia’s performances...

But I hope I can be like them and really make my
battles something fun for everyone to watch!
Hmm... This is just my own opinion, but...

I think the most important thing to remember when
being filmed is to have lots of fun while you’re
at it!
So I should just...enjoy it?

Of course, acting technique and expressing
yourself are important, too! But having fun is
number one on my list!

Y’know, I can see that! Diantha and Lisia always
seem like they’re having a lot of fun, too!

Yeah! Why don’t you give it a try with a
friendly battle?
Really?! You mean, right here and now?

Uh-huh! The best way to learn is to jump right in
and give it a go!

Gotcha! In that case...Jasmine, would you like to
have a battle with me?
I’m feeling fired up and ready for a battle now!
S-sure! I accept!
Aaaand cut!
The winner of this battle is...Hilda!
Phew... That was a close one!
Aw, we lost...
I did squeeze out a win, but just barely...
I gotta keep practicing for the event!

Um...I’ll also train very hard with Celesteela so
we can win at the event, too!
Awesome! I’ll be rooting for you both!
That was an excellent battle.

And those princess costumes look so nice on
you two.
Th-thank you!

You’ve both been chosen as leaders for the Battle
of the Golden Spheres, right?

Wearing different clothes can make you feel like a
different person. I’m a little envious that you get to
do that.

You know what? That makes sense! I do feel like
a different person!

Same here. I feel like I can do so many new
things because of this costume!
Hmmm...
What’s up?
Huh?! Oh! Nothing!

I hope you have loads of fun at the event, just like
we did today!
I’ll be cheering for you both!
Thanks, Rosa!

I-I’m looking forward to battling with you
again soon.

Right back at ya! Let’s make it fun for all the
spectators, too!
